sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Chimamaka  Ihenacho
Broadcast Journalist, Igbo
Ebe foto si, Instagram/Getty Images/ Angela campaign
E nwere obodo a ga-akọgide akụkọ ha ghara ịkọta maka maọbụ kpọta ụmụnwaanyị ha aha?
I cheta ngagharịiwe ụmụnwaanyị Aba nke a ma dịka 'Aba Women's Riot', ị mara na ọ bụghị taa ka ụmụnwaanyị Abịa kpawara ike.
Dịka e si ekwu na "n'azụ nwoke ọbụla na-eme ọfụma, ị ga-ahụ nwaanyị na-akwado ya", etu ahụ ka ọ dị n'obodo dị iche iche.
Ụmụnwaanyi chọrọ ịnapụ Buhari ọrụ ya
Ụzọ ise ụmụnwaanyị Igbo si 'pụọ iche' ebe ndị nke Saudi Arabia nọ
Kedụ ndị bụ "Ụmụada" n'ala Igbo?
Na obodo dị mma bụkwanụ na e nwere ụmụnwaanyị na-eme ihe ọma e ji eme ọnụ.
BBC Igbo chọrọ igosi gị ụmụnwaanyị Abịa steeti na-eme/mee ihe ndị mmadụ ga-eji cheta ha.
Angela Johnson
Ebe foto si, Twitter/@AngelaCampaign
Kedụ etu ị ga-esi chefuo aha ya, ọ kachasị etu a o si zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala n'okpuru pati Alliance for a United Nigeria (AUN) na ntuliaka 2019?
Johnson abụghị naanị onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụkwa onye ọkaiwu, ụkọchukwu nakwa  onye na-ede akwụkwọ ndị ụka.
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 16 nke ọnwa Nọvemba, 1959.
Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala
Ebe foto si, Reuters
Okonjo-Iweala bụ minista na-ahụ maka akụnaụba Naịjirịa oge Goodluck Jonathan chịrị Naịjirịa
N'agbanyeghi na a mụrụ ya na Delta steeti, mana a ga-agụnye ya n'okpuru ụmụnwaanyị Abịa steeti makana ọ bụ ebe ahụ ka a na-alụ ya.
A ga-akọ ole ghara ole maka Okonjo-Iweala?
A bịa n'ihe gbasara nchekwa akụnaụba obodo, ọ nọ ya.
Okonjo-Iweala abụrụla otu n'ime ndị ndụmọdụ na Twitter
Ị ma Sandie Okoro ada Igbo ọzọ welitere isi na World Bank?
A bịa n'ihe gbasara mkpata na mmefu na mbaụwa, ọ kwụ chịm.
Ọ bụ onye ihe gbasara ego na nchịkọta akụnaụba doro anya ọfụma.
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 13 nke ọnwa Juun, 1954.
Nkeiruka Onyejeocha
Ebe foto si, Twitter/ @nkeiruka_reps
Ọ bụ onye ụlọomeiwu nta nakwa onye azụmahịa.
Ọ rụọla dịka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya ndị  Isuikwuato/Umunneochi kemgbe afọ 2007, ka ọ rụchara dịka kọmishọna na steeti ya.
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 23 nke ọnwa Nọvemba, 1969.
Chinyere Kalu
Ebe foto si, Facebook/Nigerian College of Aviation Technology
Kalu enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite gbasara aka ọrụ ya dịka ọkwọụgbọelu
Kalu na-azabu Onyenauche (nke bụ aha nna ya), bụ nwaanyị mbụ fere ụgbọelu dịka ọkwọụgbọelu na Naịjirịa.
N'afọ 2006, onye bụ onyeisiala Naịjirịa mgbe ahụ bụ Goodluck Jonathan, nyere ya nturuugo "Member of the Federal Republic of Nigeria".
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 28 nke ọnwa Disemba, 1956.
Nnenna Elendu Ukeje
Ebe foto si, Twitter/HonNnennaElenduUkeje
Elendu-Ukeje arụọla n'ụlọomeiwu nta afọ 12, kemgbe ọ malitere n'afọ 2007.
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị Bende n'ụlọomeiwu.
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 24 nke ọnwa Ọktoba, 1969.
Arunma Oteh
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Oteh bụ otu onye a na-asị "unu abịala" n'ihe gbasara akụnaụba na mkpata na mmefu ego.
Oteh arụọla n'ọtụtụ ebe aha ha na-ada ụda ma a bịa n'ụwa akụnaụba; nke gụnyere World Bank, Securities and Exchange Commission nke Naịjirịa nakwa Harvard Institute for International Development, dgz.
O nwetala nturuugo 'Officer of the Order of the Niger' na Naịjirịa.
Ọ gụrụ maka kọmputa na mahadum.
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 24 nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1965.
Nkechi Justina Nwaogu
Ebe foto si, Facebook/Nkechi Nwaogu
Nwaogu bụbu onye ọrụ ụlọakụ
Nwaogu arụọla dịka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya ndị Abịa Sentralụ n'Ụlọomeiwu Ukwu kemgbe afọ 2011.
Ọ kwụsịrị ịrụ dịka onye omeiwu n'afọ 2015, mgbe T.A Orji zọtara oche yaTupu ọ banye n'ụlọ omeiwu Ukwu, ọ  nọburu n'Ụlọomeiwu Nta bido n'afọ 2003 rue afọ 2007.
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 29 nke ọnwa Mee, 1956.
Adaobi Tricia Nwaubani
Ebe foto si, Adaobi Tricia Nwaubani
Nwaubani bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ nakwa onye ntaakụkọ a ma ama.
O nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite nke gụnyere "Commonwealth Writers' Prize".
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1976.
Uche Jombo
Ebe foto si, Uche Jombo/ Instagram
Uche Jombo enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ime ejije
Ọ bụrụ na ị na-ele ejije ndị Nollywood ma ị maghị onye nwaanyị a bụ, i lewela?
Jombo na-eme ejije dịka "actress" ma na-emepụtakwa ejije dịka "director".
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 28 nke ọnwa Disemba, 1979.
Ihuoma Linda Ejiofor-Suleiman
Ebe foto si, Linda Ejiofor/Instagram
Ejiofor bụ onye na-eme ejije na Nollywood (o so na ndị a na-akpọ ndị Nollywood ọgbara ọhụrụ).
A họpụtala ya maka inweta ihe nrite dị iche iche nke gụnyere "nwaanyị kachasị eme ihe nkiri".
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 17 nke ọnwa July, 1986.
Akụkọ ga-amasị gị:
Kedụ ndị bụ "Ụmụada" n'ala Igbo?
Ndị isi ahịa amachiela ịgbu anụ ehi n'Enugwu
I nwere ala? Lee ihe ọ ga-eri gị ịrụ ụlọ aka gị
Ihe nkiri a ga-amasị gị:
Gịnị ka ị ma maka ‘Nwaanyị Nnewi’?
